EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-06-22-Bates Education Webinar.EMAIL-Follow Up Missed
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You! Watch the Tackling Challenges in Higher Education IT with Bates College Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Sorry we missed you at our Tackling Challenges in Higher Education IT with Bates College Webinar. We get it, things come up and days get busy. Fear not though, for there is a recording of the webinar that you can view at your leisure. You can find the recording here <[[http://vmturbo.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-thank-you-bates-vmturbo/]]> Please reach out to your account representative or our Evaluation Team <[[mailto: evalteam@vmturbo.com]]> if you have any questions!
-The VMTurbo Team
